text:
You don't need a better prompt, but context.

Next time you're on ChatGPT, do this:

"Before answering, ask me 5 clarifying questions so you know who I am and what I need exactly."

It will "force" you to give the right context to ChatGPT. And more context = better answers.

I wrote numerous blogs on prompt engineering.
